title: ussemoc
author: ussemoc
content: I was remembering the character from Prision Break who had the prison escape scheme tattooed on his body and a way to do the same came to my mind.and I thought about hiding BIP39 phrases in a japanese kanjis, each one represents one of the 12 words.hrases)蓋朝照祈巡崎占嘱陣腐如婚Here is the address of the BTC accountbc1qd7szt4gz9t4ft5uv7uwgecpfj9ky3z52p6p323Let's see if it will be easy to find the phrasesWhoever finds out, post the words and withdraw your bitcoins.Current balance is 0.0005 BTC in this accountThe challenge is out.
